actions.description: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level piercing damage + 1d6 force damage
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description:
The fey magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the fey's chosen mood:

- Fuming: The fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

- Mirthful: The fey can force one creature it can see within 10 feet of it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. Unless the save succeeds, the target is charmed by you and the fey for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.

- Tricksy: The fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which lasts until the end of its next turn
actions.name: [Bonus Action] Fey Step

languages: Sylvan, understands the languages its summoner speaks
name: Fey Spirit
